Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 223 Filed 04/20/21 Page 22 of 23

CONCLUSION

For the reasons set forth herein, Ms. Maxwell respectfully requests that her motion to dismiss be granted. In the alternative, Ms. Maxwell respectfully requests discovery and evidentiary hearing regarding the parties' intent in negotiating the NPA.

Dated: March 15, 2021
New York, New York

Respectfully submitted,

/s/ Christian R. Everdell
Christian R. Everdell
COHEN & GRESSER LLP
800 Third Avenue
New York, NY 10022
Phone: 212-957-7600
